Grouped_Utterances: Uh, it’s been slow. I applied to a few places, but no responses yet. Uh, a bit anxious, I guess. I just want to find something soon. I could look into that. I used to enjoy art classes. Um, still a bit up and down. Some days are better than others. I think when I see friends posting about their lives online, it gets to me sometimes. Not really. I still feel like there’s stuff I wish I’d done differently. I guess I regret not sticking with school. I didn’t feel like I was good enough.  I think it makes me doubt myself a lot. Like, I’m not capable of doing anything.
Just seeing people out and about. It felt good to be around others, even if I didn’t talk to anyone. It’s just how it is, I guess. I’m not great at making friends.
Mostly upbeat stuff. It lifts my mood.
Yeah, I went for a walk yesterday. It was nice to get some fresh air.

Well, I’ve been listening to more music. It helps a little. It might be helpful to challenge those thoughts. For example, when you catch yourself thinking you’re not capable, try to remind yourself of times when you succeeded or felt proud.
Absolutely! Let’s work on that this week. Keep a journal of those moments when you feel capable or proud. We can discuss it in our next session.
